PROMO.SQL: insert into base.BS_BOOK_SCHEME_PROMO (PROMO_ID, PROMO_NAME, BUSI_TYPE_CODE, REGION_CODE, PROMO_TYPE, COUNTY_CODE, ORG_ID, PROMO_GROUP) values ('^<PROMO_ID^>', '^<PROMO_NAME^>', '^<BUSI_TYPE_CODE^>', '0', '1', '0', '0', '0');

ALLOT.SQL: insert into base.BS_BOOK_SCHEME_ALLOT (PROMO_ID, COND_ID, BOOK_ITEM_ID, BOOK_TYPE, ALLOT_AMOUNT, ALLOT_MONTH, ALLOT_TYPE, ALLOT_SCALE, EXPLICIT_MONTH, ALLOT_BEGIN_MONTH, ALLOT_BOOK_LIMIT, ALLOT_BOOK_BEGIN, ALLOT_BONUS_ID, ALLOT_BOOK_END, ALLOT_BOOK_LIMIT_TYPE, ALLOT_ATTR, EXTEND_MONTH, CANCEL_BOOK_ITEM_ID) values ('^<PROMO_ID^>', '^<COND_ID^>', '^<BOOK_ITEM_ID^>', '^<BOOK_TYPE^>', '-1', '-1', '1', '-1', '0', '0', '0', '-24', '0', '0', '0', '^<ALLOT_ATTR^>', '0', '^<CANCEL_BOOK_ITEM_ID^>');
